participant_1.background:
I remember my mom reading me books when I was little.
when i am not touring with the band , i like to garden.
i m 49 , male and live in dublin , ireland.
I'm always looking for ways to make my home cooking more exciting, and I love trying new recipes.
I enjoy a day of fishing on my viking boat.

participant_2.background:
I proposed to my significant other on my last vacation.
I was so excited to finally graduate from college and start my career as a video game designer.
i m always hungry.
I keep up with my family but I am not always sure if they keep up with me.
I've only been at my current job for a few months, but I'm already enjoying it.

content.text: It is my first day off in awhile. I am taking a break from my band.
Congrats! I recently proposed to my partner on vacation.
That sounds wonderful! How did it go?
Very well! They said yes and we are planning our wedding.
Congratulations! What was the best part of the proposal?
I had arranged for a private chef to make us a romantic dinner on the beach.
That is incredibly thoughtful! I am sure they loved it.
Yes, they really did. We are very excited to be married.
I am happy for you both!
Thank you! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to garden, cook, and go fishing.
Fishing is a great way to relax. What do you like to cook?
I love to cook all types of food, but my favorite is probably seafood.
I love seafood too! I am always looking for new recipes to try.
I have a few good ones that I can share with you.
I would love that! Thank you!
